fields.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
fields.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
fields.ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Parmesan Cheese, Pancetta, Black Pepper
fields.steps: 1. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. In a bowl, whisk together eggs and cheese. 3. Cook pancetta until crispy. 4. Toss spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture off heat to avoid scrambling. 5. Serve with more cheese and pepper.

fields.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
fields.description: A popular Indian dish made with marinated chicken chunks in a creamy tomato sauce.
fields.ingredients: Chicken, Yogurt, Garlic, Ginger, Tomato Puree, Cream, Spices
fields.steps: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices. 2. Grill or cook the chicken until charred. 3. Sauté garlic and ginger, add tomato puree and cream. 4. Add cooked chicken to the sauce. 5. Simmer and serve with rice or naan.

fields.title: Jollof Rice
fields.description: A popular West African rice dish cooked in a rich tomato sauce with vegetables and spices.
fields.ingredients: Rice, Tomatoes, Bell Peppers, Onion, Garlic, Vegetable Oil, Chicken or Beef Broth, Thyme, Bay Leaves, Salt, Black Pepper
fields.steps: 1. Blend tomatoes, bell peppers, and onion to make a smooth puree. 2. Heat oil in a pot and fry the puree until it reduces and darkens. 3. Add broth, thyme, bay leaves, salt, and pepper. 4. Stir in rice and cook on low heat until tender. 5. Serve with grilled chicken or fried plantains.

fields.title: Gumbo
fields.description: A hearty Louisiana stew made with meat or seafood, vegetables, and thickened with okra or a roux.
fields.ingredients: Shrimp, Chicken, Andouille Sausage, Okra, Bell Peppers, Celery, Onion, Garlic, Flour, Butter, Chicken Broth, Cajun Seasoning, Salt, Pepper, Rice
fields.steps: 1. Make a roux by cooking flour and butter until dark brown. 2. Add bell peppers, celery, and onion and cook until soft. 3. Add garlic, okra, sausage, and chicken, stirring until mixed well. 4. Add broth and simmer until thickened. 5. Add shrimp and cook until just done. Serve over rice.

fields.title: Fried Plantains
fields.description: A simple and delicious West African side dish made from ripe plantains, fried until golden brown.
fields.steps: 1. Peel and slice plantains diagonally. 2. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. 3. Fry plantains in batches until golden on both sides. 4. Remove and drain on paper towels. Sprinkle with salt to taste.

fields.title: Mac and Cheese
fields.description: An American comfort food classic, this dish combines pasta with a rich, cheesy sauce.
fields.ingredients: Elbow Macaroni, Cheddar Cheese, Milk, Butter, Flour, Salt, Black Pepper
fields.steps: 1. Cook macaroni according to package instructions. 2. Melt butter in a pot and whisk in flour to make a roux. 3. Slowly add milk, stirring until smooth. 4. Add cheese, salt, and pepper, stirring until melted. 5. Combine with macaroni and serve hot.

fields.title: Egusi Soup
fields.description: A flavorful West African soup made with ground melon seeds, leafy greens, and meat or fish.
fields.ingredients: Egusi (melon seeds), Spinach or Bitter Leaf, Palm Oil, Onion, Tomatoes, Fish or Meat, Crayfish, Pepper, Salt
fields.steps: 1. Grind egusi seeds into a powder. 2. Heat palm oil and sauté onions until golden. 3. Add ground tomatoes and cook until reduced. 4. Add egusi powder, stirring until it thickens. 5. Add meat or fish, then simmer with spinach or bitter leaf until tender.
